publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2569 Nicola Sturgeon: Draft Housing Grants (Assessment of Contributions) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Grants (Assessment of Contributions) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell*
